sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details/> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001132</number> <replaced_by/> <script>Script: var scope = new GlideRecord("u_scope_request"); scope.parent = current.sys_id; scope.assigned_to = current.project_manager; scope.insert();  action.setRedirectURL(scope); action.setReturnURL(current);</script> <script_2/> <script_type>UI Action</script_type> <short_description>To increase scope on a project</short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-28 19:26:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>937f670513296240e5adbd522244b0e7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 19:26:12</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
